page.title: 02NORTH RONALDSAY'S DYKES.
page.content: The sheep dyke is a large dry_stone dyke.It goes all around the island like a wall cutting us off from other islands.The only contact with other islands is the plane and a weekly steamer,weather permitting. The hieght ranges from 1\m to 2\m. Dotted around the beach are gates for access to the beach. It was built to keep the sheep out on the shore.When it is knocked down by sea or sheep,people just build it up again. If it is badly broken down everyone is called out and they all work together to build it up.
